name: Potato Farming Manager 2000
description:
Potatoes: the king of vegetables.

Now, you can build and run your very own potato farm!

Features:

  • Grow a variety of potatoes! (Just the one variety. I'm not even certain what it is, just that it's probably potatoes.)
  • Hire a swarm of little farmers and send them out to the fields!
  • Suddenly go bankrupt because you didn't pay enough attention to wages!
  • Bulldoze whole forests as revenge for a tree killing your parents!

Don't delay! Start your farm today!
